Description: --> Fender Player Jaguar Electric Guitar (3-Color Sunburst) Used This item is slightly used and has been thoroughly checked out by our experts to make sure it is in perfect working condition. We then re-sealed it in its original packaging with all factory included accessories. This item is guaranteed to be in "as new" condition and has virtually no cosmetic imperfections. This item is covered with a one year warranty from Sam Ash. The Player Series Jaguar guitar offers a contemporary take on the famous Fender that helped pave the way for new emerging genres and styles for decades. Featuring its signature 24" scale length with a modern playing feel, this Player Jaguar also provides incredible tones thanks to a set of Player Series Jaguar pickups with coil-splitting. Vintage-inspired appointments tie together this wonderfully modern, yet still classic Jaguar incarnation. From budding musicians to well-seasoned guitarists, you can be sure that the Player Jaguar will inspire you to craft your own unique sound. Signature 24" Scale Length with a Modern Playing FeelWith a shorter 24" scale length, the Jaguar already provides an exceptionally slinky playing feel on its own. Add a modern "C" neck carve and a contemporary 9.5"-radius fingerboard with 22 frets and you can expect pure Fender playability thats truly unmatched.Player Series Jaguar Pickups with Coil-SplittingUnder the hood of this Player Jaguar sits a perfect pairing of a Player Series Alnico 2 single-coil Jaguar pickup with a powerful Player Series Alnico 3 Jaguar humbucker. Whats more? This modern marvel even comes with a slide switch thatll give you instant access to single-coil tones from the bridge position. All of that combined with 3-way pickup switching gives you a massive range of tonal possibilities.Vintage-Inspired AppointmentsWhile this is clearly a modern instrument, Fender recognizes that they need to remain true to their heritage. For this Player Jaguar, the alder body sports more traditional body contours while the vintage-style floating tremolo provides you with the additional tonal expression that helped make the original models legendary in the first place.Features:Gloss-Finished Alder BodyShort-Scale Modern "C" Maple Neck with 22-Fret, 9.5"-Radius FingerboardPlayer Series Jaguar H/S Pickups with Coil-Split Switch and 3-Way Pickup SwitchingStandard Cast/Sealed Tuners and Vintage-Style Bridge with Floating Tremolo TailpieceCase Not IncludedGet your Fender Player Jaguar Electric Guitar today at the guaranteed lowest price from Sam Ash with our 45-day return and 60-day price protection policy.
